Uses of Class
org.apache.xerces.xs.XSException

Packages that use XSException
org.apache.xerces.xs Xerces XML Schema API Interface documentation copied from Xerces 2.7.1, for the XML Schema API interfaces used to access PSVI and XML Schema model information. 
org.apache.xerces.xs.datatypes This package provides interfaces for accessing actual value information through PSVI for XML Schema 1.0 data types.
